577030.name: The Tenth Line - Digital Art Book + Soundtrack
577030.description:
About

This is an add-on for The Tenth Line that includes a book of artwork and the digital soundtrack to the game.

The art book is in 120dpi PDF format, and includes artwork of all characters and locations in the game, including never-before-seen concept sketches and designs, and developer/artist notes on their production! The total length is 68 pages.

The soundtrack contains 29 high-quality tracks of the game's music composed by Alan Monteiro, along with track titles and metadata for easy import into your favorite music device or service. This includes three tracks unique to the Special Edition of the game.

  • "Pangs" (3:36)

  • "The Feeling Fades" (0:50)

  • "Green and Grey" (2:42)
